Codo » Index » Lemonette » CacheableCollection

Class: Lemonette.CacheableCollection

Defined in: app/scripts/application/shared/cacheable_collection.coffee
Inherits: Backbone.Collection

Overview

Backbone.Collection extension to store a collection in localStorage.

This collection is synced with server everytime, but only get differences between localStorage and ApiResult. This collection add a posfix to endpoint url: "/updated?ts=" + (cacheTime) to request for only new records

Examples:


 class Currencies extends Backbone.Collection
    @include App.Shared.CacheableCollection
    url: '/currencies'
    model: Models.Currency

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) initialize()
  • # (void) syncItems(callback = void 0)
  • # (void) prefillFetch(options = {}, fireBothSuccesses) a diferencia del fetch(cache:true), aunque este cacheado igual se actualiza la coleccion
  • # (void) cacheFetch(options = {}, fireBothSuccesses) Bound si tiene cache, usa los datos cacheados, fetchea solo la diferencia, y actualiza la coleccion y el cache
  • # (void) resetFetched(data)
